---
title: "Resources"
---

Here we list a bunch of useful resources for getting started with geospatial machine learning.

----------------------------------------------------------

## Intro to GeoML

**Open Access Courses:**

- [GeoSMART Curriculum](https://geo-smart.github.io/curriculum)
- [WV View courses](https://wvview.org/courses.html) in GIS, remote sensing, and geospatial deep learning.
- [RadiantEarth ML4EO Bootcamp 2021](https://github.com/RadiantMLHub/ml4eo-bootcamp-2021)

**Other resources:**

- [Torchgeo Tutorials](https://torchgeo.readthedocs.io/en/stable/tutorials/getting_started.html#): The <torchgeo> package is an extension to PyTorch to include popular datasets, model architectures, and common image transformations for geospatial data.
